tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_ar_objects (
    user_id INT,
    object_id INT,
    last_viewed TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, object_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES ar_objects(object_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ARObjects (
  object_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  object_name VARCHAR(50),
  object_description VARCHAR(255),
  object_location_lat FLOAT,
  object_location_long FLOAT
);
